attributes.action: strip Michael Martin of his newly awarded Peerage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How can you reward this man for FAILIURE?  

Have you not listend to the people of this country, first bank bosses now politicians rewarded for FAILURE!!

We the undersigned, the people of this country will NOT stand for it!

Now please do the correct thing and REMOVE Michael Martin's Peerage or you will find out the extent of our anger when General Election time arrives.  

Thank you for your time spent reading this.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
